metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6098 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the freeDiameter functionality of freeDiameter 1.3.2. A specially crafted Diameter request can trigger a memory corruption resulting in denial-of-service. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: freediameter package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
